Title: Gochuumon wa Usagi Desu ka? Bloom
Description: ['Although the year is coming close to an end, there is no lack of fun for Kokoa Hoto and the other café waitresses! From bazaars to festivals, life is as enjoyable as it gets. As for Chino Kafuu and her middle school friends—the friendly Megumi Natsu and the playful Maya Jouga—they begin to look towards the future and decide on a high school to enroll in.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' Bonds of friendship and exciting adventures blend into ', Gochuumon wa Usagi Desu ka? Bloom, ' as the joyful lives of the café waitresses continue.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' [Written by MAL Rewrite]']
